paper_abstract: In this paper, we propose a new encoding technique that combines the different physicochemical properties of amino acids together with Needleman-Wunsch algorithm. The algorithm was tested in the recognition of T-cell epitopes. A series of SVM classifiers, where each SVM is trained using a different physicochemical property, combined with the "max rule" enables its to obtain ail improvement over the state-of-the-art approaches. (C) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Generalized Needleman-Wunsch algorithm for the recognition of T-cell epitopes
